And now he was evaluating a chocolate company - the funds director's were pushing for more diversification in consumer goods, and this private company had caught their eye, its profit margins rumoured to be fabulous, but its capital stock aging. He was here to look it over, decide if taking a 10 or 15 percent share was worthwhile - whether even more profit could be whipped out of the plant, and its manager, the oddball 'Wilma Wonka'. Chocolate held no attraction for Erick, except as something indulgent to tempt a date - but woe betide her if she ate too much of it, and ended up not hard herself....

Eric strode to the entrance, where a bright-eyed security guard took his name, checked his appointment, and issued him a visitor's pass, all while signalling Wilma's assistant that her visitor had arrived. The guard, no slouch himself, took in this skinny hardbody who weighed half what he did, and wondered why anyone would want to be so thin...why, his suit simply hung beneath his obvious pecs, no belly at all showing beneath it! The door opened beside the guard, and Wilma's assistant appeared to escort the visitor up. "I'll take you up to the conference room," said the....
122.title: Erick, a possible investor.

middling build with a slight belly...
absolutely mammoth frame - Cal filled the doorway!

12231.content:
"Mr. Hartmuskel? I'm Cal, Callisthene Manotis, Ms. Wonka's EA, and she's expecting you. I'll take you up to the conference room," said the young guy in his 20s, well dressed in a tailored three-piece chalkstripe navy blue suit. It wasn't the suit so much that grabbed Erick's attention though, as the man which it was covering. Cal looked like a Greek version of Erick - black curly hair where Erick's was blonde, olive skin where Erick's was slightly tan - but the same height, the same lean body, the same heavy pecs, the same sinewy hands. Erick wasn't sure what he'd expected in an EA in a chocolate factory, but this look-alike certainly wasn't it.

Cal held out his hand to shake, and Erick took it, then squeezed. Cal squeezed back, grinning, so Eric took the initiative and squeezed hard, only to have Cal squeeze back equally, still grinning. Impressed by his doppelganger, Erick replied in a brisk tone, "Right. I'm glad to be here. Let's get on."

Cal turned and led the visitor deep into the bowels of the plant, past windows through which Erick could watch machinery and workers toiling at chocolate production. Erick's attention was split between the lean hardbody before him and the endless motion outside the windows. Erick felt instinctly that, whatever 'Wilma' might turn out to be like, he could do business with Cal...

Cal led Erick into an elevator - spacious and glass-sided - and into a boardroom with a panoramic view of the factory interior. There...
12231.title: Cal looks like Erick!

122311.content:
Cal led Erick into an elevator - spacious and glass-sided - and then into a boardroom with a panoramic view of the factory interior. There was no one else in the board room yet, so Cal motioned towards a table at one side. "We've laid out coffee, tea, chocolate, water - help yourself."

"Chocolate?" Erick questioned. "Well, I suppose this is a chocolate factory."

"Are you a connoisseur?" asked Cal.

"No, never touch the stuff," replied Erick, taking a bottle of designer water. Cal took a square of chocolate and a coffee, and the two gym bunnies sat down together at the boardroom table.

"So, before the presentation, tell me, what is this place really like?" asked Erick, speaking as if Cal were already a friend.

"Well, the product is superb, the labour force is willing, but the competition is cut-throat," Cal replied. "Ms. Wonka pushes us regularly to innovate - new products have higher profit margins - but new product failure rates are high. We do need to modernise the joint," he added, "in a variety of areas." He paused as the two of them heard a door opening, and Wilma Wonka walked in.

"You must be Erick," she said, holding out a hand to shake. She sat down on the other side of Erick from Cal while Cal took a keyboard and called up a Powerpoint presentation.

The discussion went on for nearly two hours, as Wilma rolled through Powerpoints, spreadsheets, projections, and Erick probed with questions. Other senior personnel joined in - particularly Violet, the senior financial officer, who seemed to Erick to be like an older, female version of Cal - or of himself - in her dark tailored suit. Alphonse, the head of HR, came into the discussion late to discuss labour at the plant - and Erick noted him because he was the first non-skinny person to appear, looking to be about 40, six feet tall and...
122311.title: The presentation

choices: clad in only his shorty spandex body suit...
naked but for his super-stretch underwear!
1223112.content:
Alphonse, the head of HR, came into the discussions late to discuss labour and labour relations at the plant. Erick noted him particularly because he was the first non-skinny person to appear - all the rest had been about his size and build, though varying in height, or like Violet, lean and good looking. But Alphonse was different - he looked to be about 40, a good six feet tall and massive - built like an old linebacker gone to pot, surely at least 400 pounds! Erick tried not to look at him too much, and when he did he looked only at his face. He hoped his distaste didn't show too badly, but, really, how could anyone let themselves 'go' like that - to be SO fat, yech. But Alphonse's part of the presentation only lasted a few minutes, and Erick found himself concentrating on Alphonse's comprehensive analysis of the labour upgrading needs of Wonka, not on Alphonse's physical amplitude. Alphonse was comprehensive, thorough and efficient, and Erick found himself thinking highly of the tubby HR specialist - 'really on the ball, especially for a fat guy..."

The presentation wound down, and finally just Wilma Wonka, Cal and Erick were left in the boardroom. "So Erick," Wilma concluded, "any further questions? Or have we covered everything?"

"Oh, I'm sure there'll be further questions," replied Erick, "but this has been a most comprehensive first glance. I'll need to go over your figures, share your conclusions with our analysts, present working conclusions to our directors - I'm sure they'll have questions."

"Well," said Wilma, gazing directly at Erick with what seemed like intense interest but might have been desire - certainly Erick would have taken it that way had been been in a bar, not a boardroom, "you are welcome back here any time you like. Come back frequently! Answering your questions will be a pleasure!" She went over to the refreshment table and brought back a small, elegantly wrapped box. "I notice you only had water during our presentations - but I do hope you will take a small box of our finest chocolates, if not for yourself then for someone special in your life? This is our special sample mini-assortment..." She smiled at Erick's hesitation, and he took the box.

"Thank you," he replied. "Normally I never touch the stuff, but... And as you say, it looks like a wonderful gift. Thanks again."

"Oh good!" said Wilma. "Now, do come back any time - for even the smallest question. This investment is important to us, and I just know we can do business, you and I..." She smiled again, and continued. "Cal will see you out. Sure you won't take another box?" She produced another, which Erick accepted. He took his briefcase and Cal led him out the door.

"Is there a company gym here?" Erick asked as they rode in the elevator. "Alphonse mentioned company health programs without a lot of detail."

"Oh yes," replied Cal, "several gyms, a lot of programs, to keep folks healthy. Too many of our jobs here are sedentary," he added, and bounced a hand off his mid-riff. "I work out myself four-five times a week."

"Pity Alphonse doesn't join you," Erick blurted out, then instantly regretted his loose lips.

"Oh, but he does," Cal replied. "He's into lifting and swimming - I daresay he'd be even bigger without his cardio routine. He plays on the company football team too - wouldn't want any skinny guys there!" Cal added.

"Oh," said Erick, a touch chastened. "Well then," he continued, brightening as they approached the exit, "We'll be in touch."

"I look forward to it," replied Cal. As Erick strode out the doors, Cal headed back into the plant.

Arriving back in the boardroom they'd just vacated, Cal found Wilma waiting for him. "Well, what did you think?" asked Wilma. "Will he or won't he?"

"Well, I can see why you'd want him - he's certainly a challenge," replied Cal. "He'll be back, of that I'm sure - then we'll see. Do you mind...?"

"No, go right ahead - must be murder being that thin!"

"Yeah, it seemed to work - he took to me like a duck to water, and did you see the look of disgust he threw Alphonse! Even made a catty comment about Alphonse needing to work out while we were in the elevator. As I said, he'll be a personal challenge," he concluded, taking off the navy jacket. As Wilma watched, the vest and pants underneath seemed suddenly to grow a little, and to be completed filled by a body that seemed bigger than it was mere seconds ago. Cal unbuttoned the vest, and the gut and chest inside, plus the shirt, inflated instantly so that the vest looked as if it would never button up. Cal shrugged off the vest, and his chest and gut grew further. Reaching down around his suddenly large and protuberant gut, he undid the belt and pants, quickly shimmying so they would drop to the floor as his butt and thighs expanded to five times their previous size. His gut grew too after this move, until it filled his shirt - which he steadily unbuttoned, starting at the bottom, and as each button slipped out the belly, then chest, beneath grew larger and larger.

Finally, all of the business clothes had been shed, and Cal stood revealed in all his 750 pound glory. "That must feel good," remarked Wilma, as Cal breathed deeply,
1223112.title: Surprising 'developments'...

12231121.content:
Finally, all of the business clothes had been shed, and Cal stood revealed in all his 750 pound glory. "That must feel good," remarked Wilma, as Cal breathed deeply, clad in only his shorty spandex body suit. "What do you suppose Erick weighed?"

"155," Cal replied, his voice deeper than before. "I'm nearly five times his size - that was some shrinking job. I haven't been that skinny...you know, I was probably never that skinny, I was a pretty chunky little Greek!" He and Wilma both chuckled at this line, Cal's massive fat belly shaking with mirth, as he went on. "The looks of loathing Erick gave poor Alphonse - just think if he'd known how big I really am! But it worked - he thought I was a fellow scrawny; I even mentioned going to the gym, I bet he thinks I run too! These oompa-loompa clothes are amazing!"

"Yes indeed," remarked Wilma. "Well, eat a bit and get your strength back, then we'll call the team together for debrief. Fill THAT suit!" she added with a grin as she stepped out of the conference room, just as a serving window opened in one wall. Cal went over to the window, grabbed several filled plates, and sat down to eat, famished. "Fill this suit, she says," he muttered out loud, "the point of this suit is that I CAN'T fill it!" He started in on the plates which were filled with...

"Well, eat a bit and get your strength back, then we'll call the team together for debrief," she added, walking over to Cal and rubbing one hand affectionately over his super-fattened belly. Wilma looked on approvingly. While he gorged, she went over to a closet and brought out a set of coveralls, size 12XL. She draped them over a chair beside him. She then hurried out of the board room, and Cal quickly finished and dressed.

Ten minutes later, Wilma was back with the team, all of whom were far bigger than they'd been minutes before (except for Alphonse). Wilma said, "Well, let's consider Erick, shall we?....

122331.title: The presentations begin

123.content:
"Ms. Markus are we there yet?" asked Jimmy for the seemingly hundreth time that day.

"Nope, not yet Jimmy but soon." Ms. Markus said in the sweetest sounding voice she could manage at that time. Norma Markus was your typical grade school teacher, about six feet tall, shoulder length sandy hair and a fair complexion. One thing that was different about her though was how she felt about her job, she hated it. After two years she just decided it wasn't worth the pay to put up with the little brats. The constant questions, the whining, the inability to sit down for five minuets, she just wish should could do something to make it stop. Today was an excellent example of the times she had come to dread.

After a recent fundraiser that her school had held, she and the five students of her class who had made the most money had been awarded with a trip to the chocolate factory owned by the enigmatic Wilma Wonka, who had promised to meet them when they got there. This wasn't the problem, she had always wanted to visit the towns chocolate factory, But she wished she could do it without the various ten to eleven-year old company she kept.

First of all there was the aforementioned Jimmy, she cold swear that the little squirt had been taught how to speak by a skipping record player, as her was constantly repeating himself and restating the obvious.

Next was Sarah, probably the most antsy kid on the planet, as she couldn't even stay in her seat when Norma was adressing the whole class.

Then came Jeremy, a bully in every sense of the word. Always pushing and shoving and laughing at other kids just because he was a little taller than the other children. Norma wanted so much to put him in his place.

Maggie was another bad apple. No matter what anyone told her she was always listening to the little voices inside her head. She did whatever she pleased at all times of the day without listening to anyone, even if she hurt.

Finally, there was Amanda, a complete snob. Not only did she think that she was better than everyone else, she demanded to be treated better than everyone else. The best books, the best lunches, the best attention, nothing was to good for this girl and she knew it.

These were the kids that Norma was stuck with for the rest of the day, but unbeknownst to her, before this day was over, she would wish that she could have this day over and over again.
123.title: Field Trip

choices: The first fate, with a girl.
The first fate, with a boy
1231.content:
The school bus stopped in front of the humongous chocolate factory and Norma and the kids disembarked. The front doors flew open an out came none other than Wilma Wonka, who immediately sprand over and began to shake Norma wildly by the hand.

"OH! Welcome, Welcome Ms. Markus! So glad to finally recieve you. And the children! Oh, marvelous little darlings!"

"Well, uh great! We're happy to be here Ms. Wonka." Norma stuttered, already understanding how Wilma hadachieved her status as "Enigmatic".

"Oh, call me Wilma dearie, all of my friends do, and I have a feeling that you and I will; be very good friends before the day is out. Now, I do believe that this tour should get underway, so come along everyone."

After telling Maggie to get out of the way of the font of the bus, Jeremy to stop pushing Jimmy, Jimmy to stop asking her what the first thing that they will see, Sarah to stop jumping on and off the stair on the bus, and amanda to stop talking down to the homeless person sitting outside the gate, Norma led the kids into the factory behind Wilma.

Ms. Markus and her little troop followed Wilma Wonka inside to a fabulous visitor's centre. The kids all spotted the games right away, but being grade five and thus totally cool, did not run for them quite as they might have when younger. Ms. Wonka spent minute welcoming them, telling them they'd be taking the factory tour of a lifetime, then when she paused, the five made a break for it.

Each of the games was different, but all produced the same prize - a Wonka 'Cherry Special' for each level a player attained. Amanda, the snob, played, but when her prize came shooting out of the hatch, she ignored it.

"Aren't you going to eat your prize?" Ms. Markus asked.

"No, my family eats only the best chocolate!" Amanda replied in her haughtiest sneering tones.

"These ARE the best chocolate in the world!" Wilma Wonka stated, striding over.

"Nothing you produce could be as good as Belgian chocolate!" she retorted.

"Oh? You have to try this!" said Wilma, whipping a different chocolate out of a pocket. She unwrapped it and waved it under Amanda's nose. "This one is literally irresistible.

Amanda's mouth watered at the scent. She whipped the chocolate out of Ms. Wonka's hand, ripped off the paper wrapper, and gobbled it down in a flash. Then...

Norma was alarmed by such a surprise and made a grab for the machine. Wilma stopped her with a raised hand and gave her a comforting smile. Norma looked at the other children to see if anyone else had noticed, but they were all too absorbed in the games they were playing. By now, the machine had began pumping a fluid that looked like chocolate milk through the tube and past the little girls lips. Norma reasoned that it must've been more of the chocolate that Amanda had sampled only moments ago.

Another thing that Norma noticed is that the chocolate that Amanda was eating was starting to have an effect on her body. Her legs and arms were beginning to plump out and there was a feint sound of stretching fabric in the air. A closer inspection revealed that the stretching was comming from Amandas blouse, as the buttons were struggling to remain intact against their owner's swelling belly.
Amanda herself seemed to be in a trance as the chocolate flowed into her, as the constant flow caused her to enter a state of mild euphoria.

Jeremy was grabbing the chocolate prizes from the machines, unfortunately all of the other kids were to engrosed in their games to notice. It was Wilma who got to him first though, with Norma ariving a second later.

"Ms Markus and I have to have a little talk with Jeremy, so please don't leave this room." Everyone nodded and went back to their games while Wilma led Jeremy into a little side room with Norma following close behind.

Wilma locked the door behind them and Norma saw that this wasn't exactly a broom closet. The room they were in was easily thirty feet long and fifteen feet wide, seemingly longer because the room was completely empty. Norma snaped out of her daydream as Wilma came up next to her.

"I don't think you realize just how much trouble you're in young man." said Wilma with a sneaky smile. Jeremy sneered and crossed his arms, which he was surprised to find that it was hard to do. He looked down and noticed why, his chest was bigger! Norma's mouth fell open when she realized that her student was growing bigger all over! Jeremy's torso was swelling and billowing out and the stitches on his pants were starting to show strain. The boy looked around and tried to take stock of the situation, but by this time he could barely take a step. His legs were being spred further and further apart and his arms were becoming cone like shape.

Norma was completely aghast at the sie of her student inflating in front of her. When she finally found her voice,

You see, it's such a powerful chocolate that we've created here that the maximum that one should take in twelve hours is just one, but if you're the kind the snack-snatch or splurge, then there would be one or two consequences. I thought that it would be great for diet plans. Oh and don't wory about the boy, with the amount that I saw him eat, he should be in the perfect shape for us to teach him a lesson. He he he."

By now, Jeremy had completed his strange transformation and had grown into a huge round spherical shape. "Relax dearie. It's reversible, and besides,don't you want to take advantage of this opportunity?" Norma asked

Norma looked at her quizzicly.

Wilma sashayed over and leaned up against their bulbous captive. "I have a bit of a secret my dear. The truth is that I dispise it when children come to my factory. All that they ever seem to do is cause trouble. They steal my candy, they can't keep their hands off my machines, they can't keep still or quiet for five minuets, it's infuriating! So in my spare time, I've been working on a little side project or two to teach any naughty children a lesson, this one being my favorite. I just love to tur children into big round balls and play with them." she said as she patted Jeremys' taunt spherical side.

Norma sighed. "You know, your right. I really don't like kids myself and I would give anything to put these kids in their place! Could you help me?"

Wilma smiled. "Aha, I knew it. I knew from the moment that I met you that we would become friends." Wilma put both her hands on Jeremy and began to tip him over ont his side. "Here, dear. Catch!" She gave Jeremy a push and sent him rolling across the room to Norma. She caught him and peered down at his face. "How does it feel to be pushed around Jeremy? Back to you Wilma." Norma pushed Jeremy back across the room and realized something as she caught Jeremy again. "Hey this is FUN! Wheee!" she squeeled as she rolled Jeremy back across the room like a ball.

131.content:
Tanya had been following the mad rush for golden wonka tickets, but hadn't won any herself, although it had always been her dream to tour the wonka factory.
5 teenage girls had won, first augusta gloop, an extremely fat girl who loved to eat, then veruca salt, a spoiled rich girl, violet beauregarde, an ultra competitive girl, mikaela tv, a lover of tv, and charlene, a poor girl who was very lucky to have won.
She was very disappointed that she hadn't won herself, and thought her hopes were dashed when she suddenly received a mysterious package in the mail from Wonka. It read simply:

"You've been selected to work at my Wonka Factory and help me supervise the children and their mothers that will be coming to visit my factory. Come the day before the scheduled visit to be brought up to speed before they arrive. Congratulations

Wilma Wonka

She was a bit skeptical about this, but she really did want to live her dream and work for Wilma Wonka. Finally she decided to:

1311.content:
Tanya finally decided that she really wanted to live her dream working at the Wonka factory so she went down to the wonka factory, using the key she had received with the package to open first the gate and then the door.

When she opened the door, there stood who could only be Wilma Wonka, who had long floorlength red hair and was wearing a vibrant rainbow colored shirt and pants.

"Hello Tanya," Wilma said, "glad for you to join my workforce."

"Good to be here," Tanya said, trying to shake the woman's hand.

Instead of taking it, Wilma grabbed her and asked, "36D-24-36 am I right?"

Surprised that she had guessed her exact measurements so easily and also taken aback that she would ask, Wilma answered with, "That's correct."

"Good, at least we have something to start with," Wilma stated, still eyeing her body.

"Something to start with?" Tanya queried

"Yes something to start with," Wilma answered, "now then come visit my office and I'll show you a map of the place."

Tanya followed Wilma into a room with a couple of chairs, a desk, a huge computer, and a large map on the wall.

"This is a map of the factory," Wilma explained pointing at it, "you'll get a chance to explore all of it along with the tour that will be tomorrow."

Tanya glanced at the map, staring at the various names, from the fattening room to the breast enlargement room.

"Each of the girls and their mothers that will be coming with them have various fetishes whether they realize them or not, it will be your job to make sure that they attain these fetishes and are properly cared for," Wilma explained.

Tanya was surprised by this but Wilma continued on as if this was no big deal.

"Now then as an employee you are allowed to participate in anything the tour does as long as it does not prevent you from performing your duties, so try to keep it within moderation," Wilma told her, "you will also be given free room and board, along with meals and an infinite supply of sweets. Your family will be paid 5000 dollars each week, but you have to agree not to leave the factory without permission and sign a confidentiality agreement that you will never reveal anything that goes on in this factory, agreed?"

Wilma thought about it, she really wasn't sure just what kind of job this would be or what she would have to do but the perks were great and her family could really use that kind of money...

She finally decided to...
1311.title: go work for Wilma

A certain amount has been assigned to labor in each room and also help out with our guests. One of them will show you to your room."

Augusta stepped forward as a laser hit her and scanned all the way down her body, and Tanya immediately got it on her handheld scanner.

13111221.content:
Wilma strutted in with the group of girls right behind her. Tanya,off to the side, peered gently at the tour group's composition.

A cute brunette named Charlie stood walking behind the large group of girls. She seemed to be somewhat weary of the rest of them, adding to that was her relatively scruffy clothing compared to their high-end coverings. In front of her were a pair of triplets; Serenity, Trinity, and Beatrice Crumbs. Uniquely colored for the convenience of telling each of them apart; black, a white, and a grey. The girls seemed to be gossiping about Charlie behind, who seemed to try and sink into herself more and more.

Finally finishing this little section of tour members was purple haired Trina Troutbeck. Some punk rock looking gal with a perpetual scowl on her face.The punk did occasionally chime in on the Crumb's talk about Charlie though.

Tanya felt for the gossiped gal, but as a neutral party to the tour, she couldn't exactly offer much comfort to Charlie.

In front of the five girls was the blonde heiress for Germany's largest chocolate provider: Augustine Gloop. Her figure was curvaceous, but strangely not to zn extreme degree given her generous consumption of cocoa products.Her companion was currently enamored with her own electronic device. Micah TeVee, gaming extraordinaire was striding down the hall as if she wasn't currently in the most secure candy factory on Earth.

The duo were the least talkative of the bunch, only wanting their appropriate devices. Tanya did note though they were indulging those vices a little too much.

Finally at the head of this little coterie were three of the more...forceful ladies of the tour. Miranda Mary Piker,Violet Beaurgarde, and Verruca Salt. Straight lace, glasses wearing Piker was the smartest girl on the U.S.A Eastern seaboard. The way she moved in her red dress was precise and almost robotic. Besides her was the blue jumpsuit wearing Violet,the West coast's sweetheart.Not that sweet though because her glare could freeze ice over,but the recipient of said glare was one megalomaniac of a kid. Verruca Salt of the Britain Salt's; who stared straight ahead.

"What a crowd!" Tanya thought.

"Here we are!" Wilma's voice broke through Tanya's thoughts The owner of the establishment raised her hands to the side, showing off a large steel door. With rapt attention the group watched as Wilma snapped her fingers. The doors slowly opened up, revealing a strange place. It appeared to be a giant jungle with rivers of chocolate. White, dark, light, and all other forms of chocolate in-between.

"Come now children, let me show you my cocoa rivers and fountains." Wilma declared.

Augustine, who before seemed nonchalant to everything, dropped her chocolate to her side and ran forth in front of the group. Nobody minded that,allowing her to continue forward. Augustine smiled at all of the various colored chocolates, a part of her wanting to take a dip inside of it all.
13111221.title: Chocolate Room

choices: Greg's interested in Cherry, and she's interested in him. But he's an FA so...

132.content:
You walk through the factory doors in awe. No one has been in or out of this factory for forty years. That was why you were shocked to recieve the letter. "Dear Greg," it read. "I humbly request your appearance at my factory in one weeks time." It went on to elaborate, offering you a manager's job, letting Wilma focus more on creating new and wonderful candy and sweets for the world. If you took the job, after returning to the 'real world' to mull it over, then you would be cut off from the world for the next decade at least.

You had attended a strange sort of reverse interview, in which Wilma and her employees (not one of whom was over five feet tall) showed you the many wonders of the factory, which was much larger on the inside. You would be supervising the Oompa Loompas, although to you they seem quite capable of taking care of themselves. So your job would would almost entirely consist of hanging out with Wilma and your hot executive assistant, an Oompa Loompa named Ms. Cherry Centre, while they take care of R&D and management, respectively. And now you are spending your first week on a tour of just a few of the most utilised departments of the factory with Cherry, while the business is running smoothly.

The strange thing is that, Wilma and the Oompa Loompas all look quite young. Even though Wilma is at least seventy, she looks like Cate Blanchett in Indiana Jones 4. (Seriously, she wears those overalls and carries that riding crop, too. It's kind of bizarre! And come to think of it, Cherry looks *just* like Christina Ricci!) Of course, during the job interview they told you, if you decide to work for the Wonka factory, you too will become truly immortal.
132.title: Greg, fairly new worker.

info.brief_description: An Alternate reality where Wonka is a woman, whom is sadistic and quite kinky...
info.description:
Welcome to the Wonka Factory.

However, in this world, everything is quite different. The factory is still as magical and still as imaginative as before, however, it's much darker as Willy Wonka is no longer Willy Wonka, rather Wilma Wonka. Ms. Wonka is a sadistic, kinky person. The Factory is laden with traps and tricks for the unsuspecting visitor or intruder.

Welcome to the Wonka Factory.

Try to make it out the same way you entered. IE, not blue, not fat, or any other strange transformation what awaits you in the Wonka factory.
